title: Differece between google pixel each country
content:
Hi guys i'm new in google pixel, and i lived in Indonesia, google didn't sell their phone here so i must bought from local reseller they have two version of pixel 3 singapore and US, what's the difference between them? I mean if i bought a singapore version vs US version it'll have any different function ? esp at connection because i have an experience buying a same phone from two difference countries one device can't connect 4G+ or LTE+ but one device can connect to 4G+ did Pixel had the same thing ? 

Thank you for answering ..
